title: Police investigate double shooting of juvenile, adult
content:
CLEVELAND, OH (WOIO) -
Police are seeking information regarding the double shooting of a juvenile and another person that took place in Cleveland Thursday afternoon.
Shortly after 1 p.m., officers responded to a reported shooting at 13412 Crennell, on the city's east side. When they arrived at the scene, police discovered two gunshot victims; a juvenile and an adult.
The adult 60-year-old Jessica Marie Thompson of Cleveland was pronounced dead.
The juvenile was taken to a local hospital. No word on his condition.
So far no one has been arrested. Check back later for more details.
